mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe_content(img, content, turn, recipeId) VALUES(#{img}, #{content}, #{turn}, #{recipeId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM recipe_content WHERE recipeId = #{recipeId} and turn =#{turn}
mapper.update: UPDATE recipe_content SET img = #{img}, content = #{content}, turn = #{turn} WHERE id =#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM recipe_content WHERE recipeId = #{recipeId} AND turn =#{turn}
